com.netflix.spectator.api.patterns

Class IntervalCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.patterns.IntervalCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Counter, Meter

    public final class IntervalCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Counter
    A counter that also keeps track of the time since last update.
